A day-long cyber security competition will take place on Friday, May 7, 2010.

This hackfest will pit two teams (Red Team vs. Blue Team) against each other in a fierce battle to defend their networks while simultaneously attempting to infiltrate their opponentâ€™s network.

Various tasks scattered throughout the competition will be given by the administrative team (White Team) to further complicate things. White will also confuse and disrupt Red and Blue by similarly attempting to infiltrate their networks.

Any interested spectator may join the fun by taking an ephemeral position with White in an attempt to attack Red and Blue; therefore, bringing laptops loaded with the latest and greatest network infiltration tools is invited!
